comment.author: 41141009@N07
comment._content: This canal is called Kloveniersburgwal. I used to pass this building between university collegerooms.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/tram_5] Thanks a lot for locating, now the photo is on the map! :) I also found some information about the Trippenhuis building: www.iamsterdam.com/en/placestogo/trippenhuis/5b088ade-3f1... /Anna B.
